4.3.3 The Path structure

setPervasive

Function

Structure

Shell.Path

Type

val setPervasive: string -> unit

Syntax

setPervasive pathstring -> ()

Arguments

directory
A string containing a path.

Values

()

Description

Sets the directory where the MLWorks pervasive library resides to directory. For internal use only.
